text:
Have you ever agreed to do 
something only to regret it later?

Well, stick around because today we have a 
really funny English with Friends lesson for you,

where this happens to Phoebe.
So she as a professional masseuse

gives her friend Monica a massage and has a 
surprising if not embarrassing experience.

And by the way if you are new here we have 
new lessons coming up every week to help

you to understand fast speaking English.
Without getting lost, without missing the

jokes and without subtitles!
Just like our viewer Sisen,

whose English comprehension has improved 
so fast after watching our videos.

So be sure to Subscribe and 
hit that Bell down below if you
don't want to miss any of our new lessons!
So English is filled with colloquial expressions

just like "What the hell!?" that can be 
challenging for learners to use correctly.

It can be a bit embarrassing to try 
to use an expression just have the

person you're speaking to not understand you.
Trust me that this has happened to me a lot

in the six languages that I have learned, 
so to help you to avoid this mistake

we made our Fluent with Friends Course.
Now in this course you will learn the

words and phrases that we natives really 
use and how to actually use them yourself.

In addition you will learn the cultural 
context, so that you can understand

all the jokes and you'll have a ton of 
fun doing it with the TV series Friends.

The best part? You can try for FREE 
right now with our 3-Part Masterclass.

Just click up here or in the 
description down below to sign up now!
